node.description: The MPV5® is one of the most maneuverable power wheelchairs available today. Its unique, Round for a Reason® design enables easy navigation around tight corners and narrow spaces in your home. Hoveround's optional recline seat upgrade offers a higher seat back and adjustable recline providing additional comfort and support. (starting at $450- Not Medicare Reimbursed) When paying by credit The MPV5® is one of the most maneuverable power wheelchairs available today.
